name: Slyce Gateway
description: SLYCE Gateway is a dashboard interface that provides merchants with payment gateway access. This web application will enable users to run sales and refunds, view reports, and use several other ancillary tools.

name: Email Invoice
description: Create and send electronic invoices with pdf attachment & send secured link to customers. Customize with just a few clicks and get paid faster using payment page.

name: Slyce Global
description: A web application for managing merchant and customer transactions. Derived from Slyce Gateway.
